views.markdown:
New: - Swipe Up to Send (Swipe up on message or send button while delaying to send immediately.) - iPhone X Support - iOS 11 Support Fixed: - Resolved iOS11/iPhoneX Crash. - Fixed issue with delay logic causing messages to be sent immediately when quickly swapping between delay and not. Thanks to all on Reddit who helped test! 1.4.2-1:
-Rolled back a change that cleared message text once sending was done.

1.4.2:
- Fixed issue causing injection into unwanted apps.
- Fixed Safari/Chrome not loading correctly.
- Added support for sending once the back button is pressed.
- Added support for quick reply sending after closing notification while delaying.


SendDelay 1.4-7:
- Updated for iOS 10.
- Fixed quick reply delay not functioning.
- Fixed Send button not changing color when delaying.
-Added support for Flyer (Send image turns red when delaying and blue when not delaying.)
-Fixed a few translation issues (thanks to those sending in the fixes.)
- Cleaned up a couple things from last update.

- Rewrote some of the logic.
- Fixed the most reported crashes.
- Hopefully fixed the 'not sending' issue for some.
- Added a couple localizations, please let me know if they are incorrect or if you need some added and I will try to get them in/fixed.
Please let me know if you are still having issues. Enjoy! -Rewrote send method when going back that was causing crashes. [Swipe or Button]
-Rewrote keyboard check that was causing crashes with 3rd party keyboards still.

-Fixed crash that was introduced in the last version with 3rd party keyboards.
-Fixed send crash introduced in last version.
-Fixed issue with double sending.

-Localizations are in the works. Please email for languages that you would want included.

-Now sends when back navigation button is pressed and is being delayed.
-Now sends when backgrounding Messages and is being delayed.
-Now disables Keyboard while delaying as to not ruin current message with accidental typing.

Please notify me if you have any suggestions/problems!
